mahaloku nulata sadharana bauddha mahaththayo,puluwan nam mehema "balanna pinwathuni " kiyala thamange aagamata hint gahaganna muslim kenek hoyala denawayi?oyage lipiya man okkoma kiyewwe na,eeth deyak kiyannam, oya danne nathuwata pe rate minissu muslim aya enna issalla heluwen hitiye na,"baduwala hilawwata gedara undath ekka rayak nidiwadinna dunna wennath puluhan"oyage parapure mulath mehema ekak wenna athi samahara wita, eeka nisa thama mehema moda katha danne.ape minissuyi rajawaruyi muslim aya kiyanne kapatiyo kiyala nodana pilikawak wage pathireyi kiyala nohithapu nisa thama me minissu mechchara wyaptha wela anayak wune.eeka nisa ara haraka wunata umba kiyanna epa ethakota danagani kiyana kathawa kiyanna thama thiyanne.pali.eeth ape minissu hithana widihata me muslim prashne wisadanna ba,wisheshenma ape rate inne obathuma wage thamange aagama jathiya gana watinakamak aadarayak nathi minissu nisa thamange waththe palliyak gahuwath bonna kanna hambenawa nam hawasata adiyak gahala inna thiyanawanam hari kiyana mansikathwe pansilwath rakinne nathi bauddhayone inne.eeka thama awula.obathuma nodannawa wunata ape moda sinhalayata issara indalama karala thiyanne ehemayi,nuwara neda inne gihin balanna hoyala muslim aya idam mankollakapu hati,ape modayanta bonta dila weri wunama abbahi wunama karola kali walatath ekka liyagena thiyanne.anika thama ape ewunta ingrisi bari nisa baddata gannawa kiyala sinnakkara oppu liyagena ingrisiyen.ee nisa mona bayila gahuwath wadaka na prashneta wisaduma ape minissu adugane pansilwath rakina eken patan ganna oona, ehema nathuwa wena moka karath wadak na.anika api gahamaragena mlechchayo wela wadakuth na.eeth uda balagena kela gahagannawath, thamange jathiyata kelawanakan katawahan inna ekawath hari na.

ithin apata mehidi anumana wala elbaganimata uwamana natha. 1923 di liyon trotski ge nayakathwaya yatathe pananagunu wama wiparshawaya, rajyaya da komiyunist pakshaya da athulatha siduwemin pawathi niladharikaranaya ta erehiwa ka්ramanukula wiwechanayak wardhanaya kale ya. 1924 di stalin saha bukharin ‘thani rate samajawadaya’ pilibanda nyaya idiripath kalo ya.
